snippet.title: "Moonlight Daydream" Persona 3 Kotone Cutscenes Project Original OP
snippet.description:
Animation and Lead storyboarder: @Neptune_1313 
3D Animation @zeonyph 
Additional Storyboards: @zeonyph  & Tiny Tango
Composer: Merfie
Arrangement & Mastering: @_mosq 
Vocals @xUnreachablee & @Neptune_1313 
Lyrics: @Neptune_1313

Lyrics:

Moonlight, passes you…
Fades it all from view
All that, midnight blue...
Becomes a memory of you.

Your shadow, on the wall:
A person I can’t recall
The masks you wear
Become your face,
And your memories erase

I seen it your face—tranquillity
—Pull'n it out like some formality. 
I don't wanna feel your sympathy, 
I'm already feeling sickly

Things go dark it's hard to breathe, 
fall'n like those autumn leaves. 
I can barely stand to see, 
whatever is left of me 

The moon is fading,
Into twilight skies
Oh god please answer me;
do I have more time?

And in this moonlight daydream
Where I can’t find light
Your shadow beckons me
(Won't you let me...)

inside, all that pain I hide,
I couldn't feel,
why can't I...
believe my lie?
